title: Modeling the Differential Prevalence of Online Supportive Interactions in Private Instant Messages of Adolescents
details: O Sotolar, M Tkaczyk, J Plhak, D Smahel
abstract: This paper focuses on modeling gender-based and pair-or-group disparities in online supportive interactions among adolescents. To address the limitations of conventional social science methods in handling large datasets, this research …
